title: Aleksandar Sabev
text:
Aleksandar Sabev (; born 9 April 1988) is a <a href="Bulgaria">Bulgaria</a>n <a href="association%20football">footballer</a> currently playing as a <a href="defender%20%28association%20football%29">defender</a> for <a href="FC%20Chavdar%20Etropole">Chavdar Etropole</a>.
Career.
Sabev was raised in CSKA Sofia's youth teams. In season 2007/2008 he was loaned in <a href="Rilski%20Sportist%20Samokov">Rilski Sportist Samokov</a> and played in 25 matches with this team in <a href="B%20PFG">Bulgarian second division</a>.
Made his official debut for CSKA in the last match of <a href="A%20PFG%202008%E2%80%9309">2008–09 season in the Bulgarian A PFG (Professional Football Group)</a> against <a href="Lokomotiv%20Mezdra">Lokomotiv Mezdra</a>.
International career.
In May 2007 the Bulgarian national under-21 coach Aleksandar Stankov called Aleksandar Sabev up for <a href="Bulgaria%20national%20under-21%20football%20team">Bulgaria national under-21 football team</a> for a match with <a href="Montenegro%20national%20under-21%20football%20team">Montenegro national under-21 football team</a>.
Awards.
CSKA Sofia
